data_table.description: Ankle Brachial BP Index Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Ankle Brachial BP Index]

variable.name: ABI3
variable.description: Q3. First, second, or 3rd record, OrderID [Ankle Brachial BP Index]

variable.description: Age [Ankle Brachial BP Index]

variable.description: Body height, height [Ankle Brachial BP Index]
